FuncDef:
The eap-sim-parameter command enables a dot1x template to support EAP-SIM authentication.
The undo eap-sim-parameter command restores the default setting.
By default, a dot1x template does not support EAP-SIM authentication.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
EAP-SIM authentication is supported in AAA. You can enable or disable the function of sending the authentication parameters, such as IP address of the user, IP address of the device, and the ACName of the device to the authentication server during EAP-SIM authentication.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
